nullEngine.graphics

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • nullEngine.graphics.Window

  • public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the GLFW windowing system

    • Constructor Detail

      • Window

        public Window(java.lang.String title,
              int width,
              int height,
              boolean fullscreen,
              @Nullable
              org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWVidMode fullscreenVideoMode,
              long monitor)
        Create a window
        Parameters:
        title - The window title
        width - The window width
        height - The window height
        fullscreen - Wether it should be a fullscreen window
        fullscreenVideoMode - The video mode (ignored if fullscreen is false)
        monitor - The monitor to put the window on (ignored if fullscreen is false)
